mapper.select: /* getWorkCodeList */ SELECT * FROM DJ_CAMTIC.V_WORK_CODE WC JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.V_WORK_GROUP_CODE WGC ON WC.WK_GROUP_CODE_ID = WGC.WK_GROUP_CODE_ID WHERE WGC.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND WGC.WK_GROUP_CODE = #{wkGroupCode}
mapper.insert: /* setOverWorkPlan */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_OVER_WORK_PLAN ( REQUEST_EMP_SEQ, REQUEST_POSITION, REQUEST_DEPT_SEQ, REQUEST_DEPT_NAME, REQUEST_DUTY, APPLY_OVER_WORK_TYPE, APPLY_DATE, APPLY_START_HOUR, APPLY_START_MIN, APPLY_END_HOUR, APPLY_END_MIN, APPLY_HOUR, APPLY_REASON, DINNER_TIME_USE, REMARK, REG_EMP_SEQ, APPR_STAT ) VALUES ( #{request_emp_seq}, #{request_position}, #{request_dept_seq}, #{request_dept_name}, #{request_duty}, #{apply_over_workType}, #{apply_date}, #{apply_start_hour}, #{apply_start_min}, #{apply_end_hour}, #{apply_end_min}, #{apply_hour}, #{apply_reason}, #{dinner_time_use}, #{remark}, #{request_emp_seq}, #{apprStat} )
mapper.select: /* getOverWorkPlanUserList */ SELECT VEI.EMP_NAME_KR AS EMP_NAME, VEI.DEPT_NAME, VEI.DUTY_NAME, VEI.EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_OVER_WORK_PLAN OWP JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO VEI ON VEI.EMP_SEQ = OWP.REQUEST_EMP_SEQ JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.V_WORK_CODE WC ON WC.WK_CODE = OWP.APPLY_OVER_WORK_TYPE WHERE 1=1 AND OWP.ACTIVE = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(OWP.REG_DATE, '%Y%m') = #{apply_month} GROUP BY EMP_NAME_KR ORDER BY OWP.REG_DATE DESC
